1: <pb/><e>Bit yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>A wal yet max q'uexon el Jehová tzet ayoc yiban Sión, axca tol co wayich max jut jiloni.</t>
2: <t>Cata wal tu' bian, max jakon wal co nabal co tzewi, cax max el jaw yin tzalojc'ulalil. Xan max yal eb tx'ok conoblak: A Jehová max ak'on mimek watx'c'ulalil bay eb, ẍi eb.</t>
3: <t>Yel toni, a Jehová max yak' mimek watx'c'ulalil ayon, a' xan ayon oc yin tzalojc'ulalil.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Mamin, ak' a watx'ilal jiban junelxa, axca wal chi yun yaxbi sat tx'otx' tx'otx' yuj elom a' bay Néguev.</t>
5: <t>A eb chi awwi yin ok'ilal, ok waj eb sat awoj yin tzalojc'ulal.</t>
6: <t>Caxc'al mi chi ok' eb yet chi yawon eb inat ochebil, axa yet ok elol ixim trigo, bit-xac'al ok yun eb yuj tzalojc'ulal, yujtol mek'bilxa oc ixim yuj eb.</t>
